result.prevName: Credit Rating And Collection Company K.P.S.C
result.longName: Credit Rating And Collection Company K.S.C. (Public)

assetProfile.address2: First floor Al-Sharq - Ahmad Al-Jaber Street PO Box 1432
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Credit Rating and Collection Company K.S.C. (Public), together with its subsidiaries, provides trade debts collection and purchase, and investment services in Kuwait. It offers invoice management service, a pre-collection program designed for clients to hand over their invoices and contracts; direct collection service, a collection service directly from debtors for new, overdue, or bad debt accounts; special and executive collection service, a program targeting collection of overdue debts from individuals and corporates on behalf of corporate clients; and skip tracing service, a service that determine the location of the debtors. The company also provides legal action service that offers legal advice regarding filing claims before the law courts against civilians, travel ban orders, arraignment and arrest warrants, assets seizure orders, foreclosures, and other legal aspects; international collection service; debt remedial and risk management service; and credit rating service, which provides investors with critical information to enable them to take informed investment decision based on their risk-return preferences. In addition, it engages in the renting and leasing of land and real estate properties. Credit Rating and Collection Company K.S.C. (Public) was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait. Credit Rating And Collection Company K.S.C. (Public) operates as a subsidiary of Investment Dar Company K.S.C.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Ibrahim Abbas Othman Al-Sukhi
companyOfficers.title: Vice Chairman, Chief Exec. Officer and Managing Director
